title: Marketplace Tech for Friday, October 10, 2014
teaser: First up, Faith Hope Consolo, Chair of the Retail Group at Douglas Elliman Worldwide, talks about Amazon's brick-and-mortar retail store opening in New York City. And how well have you kept up with the week in tech news? Host Ben Johnson takes on Anna Sale, host of the Death, Sex, and Money podcast, for this week's Silicon Tally.
description: First up, Faith Hope Consolo, Chair of the Retail Group at Douglas Elliman Worldwide, talks about Amazon's brick-and-mortar retail store opening in New York City.
